name: Legend of the Nine Colored Deer (九色鹿传说)
name_original: Legend of the Nine Colored Deer (九色鹿传说)
description:
"Legend of the Nine Colored Deer" is a third-person adventure puzzle game filled with Chinese mythological stories. In this fantastical world, players embark on a mysterious journey, exploring ancient mythical tales and the magical legend of the Nine-Colored Deer. The game features eight meticulously designed levels, each filled with puzzles, challenges, and surprises.

In the game, players take on the role of a young adventurer who travels through the world of myths, seeking the trail of the Nine-Colored Deer. They must solve various puzzles and challenges, explore ancient ruins and mysterious caves, encounter mythical creatures and immortals, and face powerful enemies, all while unraveling the mysteries of the legend of the Nine-Colored Deer.

Each level in the game has its own unique characteristics, requiring players to use their wits and skills to overcome various challenges. As the game progresses, players will unlock new abilities and equipment, enhancing their strength to face even greater challenges.

"Legend of the Nine-Colored Deer" not only allows players to experience the charm of ancient Chinese mythology but also immerses them in a fantasy world full of adventure and exploration. Get ready to embrace the challenges, unravel the mysteries of the Nine-Colored Deer, and become a legendary hero!

Game Guide:
left mouse button click item interaction
Press and hold the right mouse button to rotate the viewing angle
WASD moves, space jumps

Words from the developers:

This game commemorates a "Nine Colored Deer" cartoon that we watched when we was a child. Our childhood memories are always so beautiful. I hope to contribute a small amount to the traditional culture. We will continue to work hard to make a series of related works of traditional cultural stories.
Please forgive us for the shortcomings!

Weiqi Zhao (producer + programming + 3d model + animation + game level design)
Xiang Jin (special effects and optimization)
